words.def: (Greek mythology) the rarified fluid said to flow in the veins of the Gods
a chorus that sings as part of a religious ceremony
people who have possessions and wealth (considered as a group)
stiff coarse fiber from the outer husk of a coconut
the circulating life energy that in Chinese philosophy is thought to be inherent in all things
the 17th letter of the Greek alphabet
mythical bird of prey having enormous size and strength
A Hebrew measure of capacity; a core or homer.
Any of several large, ferocious sea creatures, now especially the killer whale .
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a midwestern state in north central United States in the Great Lakes region
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
A working-class punk rock  subgenre of the 1970s, sometimes associated with racism.
